Minimum Concentration:0.0675% solids.2.1 or 4 Bottle(s) (5.9ml per 100 tese bottle /26.3ml per 500 test bottle) Conjugate:Anti- HBs (Goat, IgG) Acridinium-LabeledConjugate in MES buffer with protein stabilizersMinimum concentration:0.25u g/mlArchitect HBsAg Manual Diluent:1 Bottle (100ml) Architect HBsAgManual diluent containing recalcified human plasma, nonreactiveFor HBsAg, HIV-1 Ag, anti-HIV-1/HIV-2, and anti-HBs.Architect i Pre-Trigger Solution:Pre-Trigger solution containing1.32% (W/V) hydrogen peroxide.Architect i Trigger Solution: Trigger solution containing 0.35NSodium hydroxide.
